content: The Earth Wolf is in Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge. Follow the path from the Sandgate Village Keeper's Shrine and work your way around to the left, taking out the archers and other enemies as you go. You will eventually circle around to the Earth Wolf's arena, where you can fight for his Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Earth Wolf is in Sandgate Village in Yellow Wind Ridge. Follow the path from the Sandgate Village Keeper's Shrine and work your way around to the left, taking out the archers and other enemies as you go. You will eventually circle around to the Earth Wolf's arena, where you can fight for his Spirit.
